ygData.subject: KeyedProperties in Processor
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I was just looking at Processor and wondering about the use of KeyedProperties in H3. As the configuration is now done through a spring application

Hi,

I was just looking at Processor and wondering about the use of KeyedPr=
operties in H3. As the configuration is now done through a spring applicati=
on context, a PropertyOverrideConfigurer can be used to override almost eve=
rything. So is there is a reason for the keyedProperties?

I may be missing=
 something.

Bertrand
